info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 3:30AM CDT until June 08 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR TEXAS COUNTY... At 328 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located over Elkhart, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. Elkart Airport in southwest Kasnas measured a 70 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Hooker, Goodwell, Texhoma, Optima, Hardesty, Eva, Hough and Adams. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
